entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6 except minus 2 along the coast. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning early in the evening and ending after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022
